title: AI-native agents are breaking brittle workflows, ushering in fresh programming mindsets
description: As organizations look to roll out artificial intelligence initiatives, they’re quickly discovering that the fixed workflows and step-by-step procedures that work so well in traditional programming come up short when designing models for AI-native agents.  Bec…
